channel.description: Recent content in processes on Leslie TANG

item.title: Planned vs Unplanned
item.description: 2 broad approaches to doing things plan first do and make spontaneous changes according to new information Planning for Costly Work I used to think planning first would be better, cause you would make less mistakes. I now think that depends on your proficiency with the subject matter. It also depends on the stakes. If the plan would affect lives of others, then it make sense to have a plan, and have others verify the soundness of the plan.
